name: Jupiter Moons: Mecha
storyline:
At the dawn of colonization of Jupiter's moons, megacorporations gave rise to metropolises—and to conflict. Cities were razed while millions of lives were lost. As the dust cleared, the corporations had all but completely abandoned the moons.
A wild frontier was born. Now home to the lawless and brave, things are slowly rebuilding. Immigrants from Sol's other planets arrive seeking a new life. Freelancing bounty hunters are all that remain to uphold a new, tenuous sense of order.

None knew that the bombing of Ganymede's capital had awakened something long in hibernation. A mysterious force emerged capable of corrupting machines, turning them into hostile killing machines.

Jupiter Moons: Mecha puts you in the pilot seat of a bounty hunting mech. Take on the industrial muscle of the Taka Construction, outsmart the elite swiftness of the Gendai Spec and fight beard to beard with a group of mech pirates. With the corruption spreading, more bounties mean more danger...more danger means more profit!
summary: Choose your mech, customize your loadout, and build your perfect deck. Experiment with cards to find powerful combinations as you enjoy the tactical combat and deckbuilding in this roguelike adventure!
